resources.string:
My Land Bank is one fast rising star in the real estate sector incorporating fresh thinking and creativity, in tune with the times. Today, we have a solid customer base of over 4,000 satisfied customers which is on a rapidly growing momentum.

 Strategic location selection, conduct of due diligence to ensure clear title, assessment of value, excellent development and astute pricing have ensured that the value of our projects have delivered 50-100% growth for many of our customers within relatively short periods (1 to 2 years). All our townships have excellent amenities and layout with Tar roads, Boundary wall to the layout, Security gate, Street lights, Landscaping, Children’s play area and much more.

 Each project is nurtured with care – converting virgin lands to desirable living spaces. Our projects are defined by low initial costs for customers/investors. This makes it possible for locals to access projects for homes and NRI’s to buy relatively larger plots for investments. Since the rate of growth of our projects is higher than those in developed spaces like metros, we have delivered excellent ROI.

 In an industry sullied by developers who failed to deliver and had under-delivered, My Land Bank has proved its worth by under-promising and over-delivering. From top management to the lowest staff cadre believes in walking the talk and keeping promises. This is the culture inculcated and nurtured at My Land Bank.

 It is believed that in Kerala, with its high density of population, land, is perhaps the scarcest commodity. Value of land in Kerala has witnessed continuous appreciation all through the years except in a brief period during the late 70’s when there was rampant over-speculation. My Land Bank is built on strong foundations and led by experts from the real estate and construction sectors. Our professional marketing network and bevy of satisfied customers makes it possible to ensure liquidity of property within short periods.

 Prime Lands, is our marketing division. It has created a core group of dedicated professionals working towards real estate sales. In effect, we have professionalized our marketing activity with structured and defined purposes and targets.

 VISION
 “Make people Proud, Secure and Smile"

* Respect for the individual

* Service to the customers above everything else

* Encourage new and innovative ideas

* R & D as a continuum

* Accountability
